title: Which of the following was true of the United S...

content.prompt: Which of the following was true of the United States Constitution as adopted at the Constitutional Convention?

choices.label: It was built on a series of compromises.
It provided exact specifications covering all aspects of government.
It was a revised version of the English Constitution.
It allowed all male citizens over the age of twenty-one to vote.

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
